name: Unforgiven: Shattered Souls
description:
This is a platformer with a hint of horror and unease. In this game you are promised an engaging story, fun gameplay and various boss fights. I hope you enjoy this experience as it is my very first shot at making a game.

Keep in mind the imagery might get disturbing...

STORY :

You're guided by the voices from within granting abilities to fulfill your destiny but things might get messy

You are promised :

---PLATFORMING

---BOSS FIGHTS

---GOOD MUSIC

---INTERESSTING STORY

hope you enjoy the overall experience
